title: Soulful Lounge - 25 Min Smooth Focus Music | Pravos Deep Work Sessions
description:
Experience Soulful Lounge - a 25-minute smooth, jazzy journey designed for relaxed concentration and creative flow.

I built Pravos (www.pravos.xyz) because focus shouldn't require assembly. One workspace. Music, timer, tasks. That's it. No browser tabs. No app-switching. Just sit down and work.

This album brings warmth and groove to your focus session while staying out of your way. The same 25-minute arc you'll find in all Pravos music, but with soul.

Try Pravos: www.pravos.xyz

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
ABOUT THE MUSIC
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
25-minute instrumental focus sessions

Perfect for late-night work and creative sessions
